   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Tabel's documentation
=====================

Tabel provides a lightweight and intuitive object for data tables, two
dimensional tables with rows and columns. Based on Numpy, therefore fast and
seamless integration with all the popular data tools.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 6
   :caption: Contents:


   readme
   performance

   cookbook
   api/index

   license
